t: The Amazon Wildfires Aren't Natural. Blame Humans
s: August 9, 2024 - As the Amazon burns, it's important to know that intense wildfires aren't natural to the largest tropical rainforest ecosystem on Earth—people are to blame.

t: Amazon Brand Book | Important information for brands on Amazon
s: When you have registered your trademark through Amazon Brand Registry, Amazon uses information about your trademark to detect and actively remove wrong or inaccurate content. Product notifications that infringe on your intellectual property will also be detected and removed.

t: Ontbossing neemt af, maar branden woeden voort in het Amazonegebied | Amazon Watch
s: September 12, 2024 - Het Amazone-regenwoud, ooit constant gehuld in mist, kampt nu met steeds langere droogtes, samen met aanhoudende ontbossing. Hoewel we het tempo van ontbossing lijken te vertragen, vergroot de schade die al is aangericht de brandbaarheid van het bos door "fragmentatie". De uitgestrekte, ononderbroken groene ...

t: Duizenden branden in Amazonegebied, wat is er aan de hand?
